meanings.definition: In a manner relating to or characteristic of the future.
meanings.sent1: She gazed futuristically at the stars, dreaming of what tomorrow may bring.
meanings.sent2: The scientist predicted the weather patterns futuristically, considering climate changes.
meanings.sent3: The children played with toy robots, pretending to live futuristically in a world of technology.
meanings.sent4: Her mind raced futuristically, envisioning a world where flying cars were the norm.
meanings.sent5: The author described the alien planet futuristically, painting a vivid picture of its advanced civilization.

meanings.definition: With a focus on or anticipation of future developments.
meanings.sent1: The futuristically designed building stood out among the traditional architecture.
meanings.sent2: The company's futuristically minded CEO always sought innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The futuristically dressed man turned heads with his metallic suit and neon accessories.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were so futuristically bold that they sparked a revolution in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The futuristically decorated room felt like a glimpse into a world yet to come.
